subject: Re: xorg server error on init
body:
On Thu, Apr 19, 2007 at 06:59:31AM +0700, Sandi Sufiandi wrote:
> conflict dependencies, then run dexconf, It works. and the I load the kernel 

you need X up and running before running dexconf ...

> module for all hardware driver. but I got new problem.
> How to set LC_ALL=

% dpkg-rconfigure localeconf

or the like, iirc.

-- 
paolo
